text: yadi tumapar allaah ka udaar anugrah aur usakee dayaaluta na hotee to unamen se kuchh log to yah nishchay kar hee chuke the ki tumhen raah se bhataka den, haalaanki ve apane aap hee ko pathabhrashti kar rahe hai, aur tumhen ve koee haani nahin pahuncha sakate. allaah ne tumapar kitaab aur hikamat (tatvadarshita) utaaree hai aur usane tumhen vah kuchh sikhaaya hai jo tum jaanate na the. allaah ka tumapar bahut bada anugrah hai
